title: Swan Bitcoin CEO Envisions Bright Future for Bitcoin: Spot ETFs, Safe Haven Status, and Growing Investor Base
description: On December 1, Cory Klippsten, CEO of Swan Bitcoin, shared his thoughts on Bitcoin on Bloomberg Radio with Carol Massar and Bailey Lipschultz, discussing the future of Bitcoin, particularly in 2024. Swan Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency service focused on facilitating the purchase and investment in Bitcoin. Their primary service is enabling users to regularly buy [â€¦]
